MESSAGE.value: Numerous minor profile tweaks, weather enhancements, and bug fixes
Added weather condition to route callback for production
Added Dark Sky API info, admin route, weather icons mapping
Admin Settings now in db, blog pulling from db
Fixed nav bar not recognizing user on blog; fixed blog box shadow display; minor formatting fixes to profile img
Pushing nav bar changes to prod
Fixed profile picture on Profile
Nav bar picture fixed
Fixed caret for Profile and Account in nav bar
Adds ability to delete blog posts from Admin Dashboard, blocks users who don't have admin role from accessing Admin Dashboard (hopefully)
Updates app.js to define PostModel and AdminSetting
Adds app.get for /needAdmin which I forgot in the previous push
Fixed radio buttons on ADmin
Added a ton of bug fixes, added material design elements, ability to edit blog posts, & more.
Fixed margins on weather.pug
Fixed navbar>open color
Fixed navbar color scheme on mobile
Fixed button width by removing bootstrap col classes
Styling updates
Fixed that crap causing inputs to move other elements on focus
Adds hashFix and initial Hue on/off functionality
Trying to fix Hue
Toggle Hue lights in production using IFTTT Maker
Updated lightsObject.json file
Testing changes pulling lights state from db
